name: Gamar
slogan: Educational and engaging AR gaming experiences, now introducing: Farm Fare
description:
Easily scan and map your surroundings to create natural interactions with 3D augmented reality for discovery and engagement. Gamar created a platform with a scalable 3D recognition technology for anyone to map the real world in its natural environment and create engaging experiences with a simple drag and drop content management system.

Sign up today to create unlimited content to engage your audience: http://cms.gamar.com

Explore what other iconic brands have created: 
App Store - https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/gamar/id885541706 
Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamar.platform

Farm Fare

Gamar's latest creation, Farm Fare aims to educate players about the importance of conservation farming by presenting them with content through a familiar and fun medium. The backstory, that focuses on a budding farmer taking on the farm from an older family member, demonstrates that this is an age-old tradition that is now coming into the future. 

Protecting native, rare breeds of farm animals is an important part of sustainable farming and a way toward protecting our planet. Through the introduction of adorable characters we want players to not only learn about rare breeds but gain an affiliation with these animals that encourages them to want to protect them. 

Farm Fare has drawn on the success of other popular location-based collection games but offers a completely unique gaming experience. Not only can players collect the different animals but they then must care for the animals on their home farm. Combining both collection and digital pet experiences.

jobs.title: Junior Sales Executive
jobs.description:
**** No Recruitment Agencies Please *****

Gamar developed a unique platform with 3D augmented reality technology - which enables anyone to create games and fun trials by themselves; Our clients include top brands like Madame Tussauds, London Sealife and British Museum.

We are looking for an experienced person who can sale a technical digital product on phone and face to face.

Responsibilities include:

- Understand the existing pipeline and prospect for potential new clients to turn them into an increased business.
- Meet potential clients by growing, maintaining, and leveraging your network.
Research and identify potential clients, and the decision makers within the client organisation and build relationships.
- Handle objections by clarifying, emphasising agreements and working through differences to a positive conclusion.
- Use a variety of styles to persuade or negotiate appropriately.
- Training from senior management will be ongoing and you will receive all the tools necessary to succeed

Business Development Planning:

- Attend industry functions, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market and creative trends.
- Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales.
- Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the company’s unique selling propositions and differentiators.

Education:

A bachelor’s degree and 1-3 years of sales experience.

The package is based on experience with an uncapped commission structure and competitive basic salary to London standards.

You should be available to start immediately.

Apply now!

jobs.title: Junior Marketing Executive
jobs.description:
**** No Recruitment Agencies Please *****

Gamar developed a unique platform with 3D augmented reality technology - which enables anyone to create games and fun trials by themselves; Our clients include top brands like Madame Tussauds, London Sealife and British Museum.

We’re looking for a passionate and imaginative marketing executive intern to expand our user base.

Responsibilities:

- Understanding the Gamar Platform, its features and the content that's created by our clients.
- Client engagement activities such as creating user meets, competitions between them and conferences
Creating client testimonial videos, videos at the events and at the client's place
- Creating new ways to engage with the users of the app online and onsite in partnership with our clients
- Expanding the reach of the app, through social media, PR, events, cross-promotion opportunities, ad networks.
- Managing our player acquisition, campaigns on mobile, ad networks.
Improving our online presence and ensuring our websites are always updated.
- Good storytelling skills and strong written and oral communication.
Network, speak and represent Gamar at social events.

We are looking for a person who worked in the Marketing profession for at least 1 year or has a strong educational background in Marketing or highly relevant internships.

Depending on the experience this could be a 3-month paid internship to build a great portfolio - with a possibility to become full time or a Junior Marketing Executive role. We will be investing our time in you, so, come prepared take ownership of making a dent in this industry.

You should be available to start immediately and you’ll be working in our offices in Farringdon.

Apply now!

Apply now!

jobs.title: Senior Unity Developer
jobs.description:
**** Please No Recruitment Agencies *****

Gamar is an award-winning game development studio, looking for a passionate and talented senior Unity game developers. You are the right person for this role if you are a self-starter, strive to “wow” with your work, and are passionate about creating fun games.

Responsibilities:

- Developing exciting games with Unity3D and lead other developers
- Developing shaders/ particle system to create spectacular special effects
- Working on strategic planning of the architecture for the games
- Helping other team members with code and architecture on a high-level and low-level basis
- Solving complex Unity3D problems.

Qualifications & skills:

- Must love games!
- 3 to 5 years experience in Unity3D using C#
- Thorough understanding of networking and graphics, performance issues and tradeoffs
- Impeccable attention to detail
- Ability to work on fixed deadlines
- Organised and determined
- A can-do’er with epic enthusiasm
- You’ll be working in a great, small close-knit team; you’ll need to be able to work with little supervision.

Competitive package offered depending on your experience.

You should be available to join immediately.

You must reside in or around London and be able to work from our offices – Monday – Friday – near St. Pauls/ Farringdon.

jobs.title: Fullstack ASP.NET developer focussed on the frontend
jobs.description:
**** No Recruitment Agencies Please *****

Gamar developed an award-winning platform with 3D augmented reality technology - which enables anyone to create games and fun tours by themselves; Our clients include top brands like Madame Tussauds, London Sealife and British Museum.

We are looking for a junior ASP.Net Developer, the role which will involve joining an established and successful development team. The role will include; ASP.Net, C#, MVC (/WebForms), SQL Server, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and has previously worked in a SCRUM environment.

The ideal candidate is a full-stack developer with a focus on frontend side.

The role includes, but is not limited to:

- Interpreting graphic visual or interaction designs in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
- Creating visually appealing web pages or interfaces.
- Testing cross-browser, cross-platform, and/or cross-device compatibility for inconsistencies.
- Conducting observational user testing and functional testing.

Package offered depending on your experience and having a bachelor's degree in Computer Science is a must.

You should be available to join immediately.

You must reside in or around London and be able to work from our offices – Monday – Friday – near St. Pauls/ Farringdon.

jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
jobs.description:
**** No Recruitment Agencies Please *****

Gamar developed an award-winning platform with 3D augmented reality technology - which enables anyone to create games by themselves; Our clients include top brands like Madame Tussauds, London Sealife and British Museum.

We are looking for a junior web developer, who will involve joining an established and successful development team.

Experience with basic web development is required and you can learn ASP.Net on site. We use the following: ASP.Net, C#, MVC (/WebForms), SQL Server, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and work in the scrum environment.

The role includes, but is not limited to:

- Interpreting graphic visual or interaction designs in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
- Creating visually appealing web applications.
- Testing cross-browser, cross-platform, and/or cross-device compatibility for inconsistencies.
- Conducting observational user testing and functional testing.

The package offered depending on your experience and having a bachelor's degree in Computer Science is a must.

You should be available to join immediately.

You must reside in or around London and be able to work from our offices – Monday – Friday – near St. Pauls/ Farringdon.
